name: Age of Attrition (Raining Sideways)
description:
Manage your kingdom during a 30 day siege as four factions all argue over what the best course of action is and how much money should be dedicated to what. This game was made by Video Game Development Club for our spring 2017 semester project. 

Click on a factions text box to go with their solution and drag the diamonds to allocate money where you feel it would best be used. Recommended resolution 1280x720

I was the secondary sound team lead and made the theme that plays when everything is going well.

Going Good Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/age-of-attrition-going-good

VGDC: https://vgdc.umn.edu/
